mapper.insert: insert into lt_store (id, name, platform, is_active, company_id, ebay_api_key_id, HardExpirationTime, ebay_site_code, last_listing_sync_time_utc, create_time_utc, create_user_id, update_time_utc, update_user_id, ebay_token) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ebayToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update lt_store
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ebay_api_key_id = #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HardExpirationTime = #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ebay_site_code = #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_listing_sync_time_utc = #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ebay_token = #{ebayToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lt_store set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_api_key_id = #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HardExpirationTime = #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_site_code = #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_listing_sync_time_utc = #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_token = #{ebayToken,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lt_store set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_api_key_id = #{ebayApiKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HardExpirationTime = #{hardexpirationtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebay_site_code = #{ebaySiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_listing_sync_time_utc = #{lastListingSyncTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.ebay_token,b.api_url,b.dev_id,b.app_id,b.cert_id,b.runame from lt_store a inner join lt_ebay_api_key b on a.ebay_api_key_id=b.id where a.company_id=#{companyId} and a.id=#{storeId}
